definitions.definition: A group of individuals chosen from the general population to hear and decide a case in a court of law .
A group of judges in a competition.
The audience attending the first night of a performance , whose reaction may determine whether it succeeds or fails.

main_definition: ( law ) A group of individuals chosen from the general population to hear and decide a case in a court of law .
secondary_definitions: A group of judges in a competition.
( theater , slang ) The audience attending the first night of a performance , whose reaction may determine whether it succeeds or fails.
